info.name: WebexCC Desktop APIs - Sample
info.description:
Implementation of Task Routes for processing

Contact Support:
 Name: WxCC

request.description: Allows the user to logout from their Desktop. This API needs to be called once the WSS session has been successfully established.

response.name: The task was accepted for processing.

request.description: Allows the user to login to their Desktop. It does not allow a duplicate login and sends an error message over websocket, if an active session already exists

request.description: Access this Endpoint when the user has to hold a call. When an user is in consulting state, the task will be put on hold. It is not applicable for Chats and emails. Requires 'cjp:user' scope for authorization

response.name: The task was put on hold for processing.

request.description: Access this Endpoint when the user has to resume a call from hold. When an user is done consulting, the previously held interaction with the customer should be resumed. It is not applicable for Chats and emails. Requires 'cjp:user' scope for authorization.

response.name: The task has been resumed for processing.

request.description: Access this Endpoint when the user has to reject a task.Once a task is rejected, the status of the user goes to idle from available. Requires 'cjp:user' scope for authorization.

response.name: The task has been rejected for processing.

request.description: When configured by the administrator, telephony tasks are often being recorded for various reasons. When an user is handling sensitive customer information, he/she might want to pause the recording and later on resume recording.

response.name: The task was accepted for processing.

exec: //Set timers for the token on the Environment
var expires = pm.environment.set("expires", new Date(new Date(setCountDown).getTime() + 60 * 60 * 10 * 1000).getTime());
// Make a logical decision to renew Access_Token every 10 hours
console.log(`new token stored, expires in 10 hours`);
console.log(`All good.  Looks like we still have some left until token expires.`);
